name: Deathcore
description: Integrates brutal palm-muted and tremolo-picked riffing, blast beat-focused drumming, and guttural vocals of Death Metal with groovy breakdown sections.

children.name: Downtempo Deathcore
children.description: Slow and minimal songs emphasizing breakdowns, atmosphere, and dissonance with downtuned guitars.
